package.name: MacOS Microsoft Outlook
package.releaseNotes: • Themes by Copilot: Enable users to personalize their Outlook app with AI-generated themes that are unique to them, based on their favorite styles and contexts. • Fixed an issue where search was triggered without meaningful input. • General accessibility improvements.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft OneNote
package.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.
Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience.
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app by clicking on the smiley face in the top-right of the app. Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

package.name: MacOS Microsoft OneDrive
package.releaseNotes: Thank you for using OneDrive. We are always looking to update OneDrive to bring you the latest performance improvements and bug fixes for the best experience.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft Windows App
package.releaseNotes:
In this release we made the following updates:
• Fixed slurred audio that was being rendered when using Teams optimizations. • Added a connecting/connected state indicator to workspace headers. • Fixed some bad code that was corrupting app icons displayed in workspaces. • Added the ability to switch between remote apps from the Window menu and Dock icon. • Improved threading for the graphics decoder to improve performance. • Resolved z-order issues between remote apps and local windows. • Fixed a bug that caused incorrect mouse coordinates to be sent if the session window was resized while reconnecting.
If you encounter any errors, you can contact us via Help > Submit Feedback.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft To-Do
package.releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs to improve the app experience.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft Azure VPN Client
package.releaseNotes: Added auto reconnect on VPN connections for intermittent/ server failures. Added notification which notifies user to install rosetta in case its not installed in arm machines. Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
